ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Add/Edit modal with MySQL
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? - [ ] Long text, default option not shown - [ ] Select checkbox from the dropdown, and then change to multi-select; default option still shows checkbox - [ ] Console error on selecting multi-select ``` chunk-I4FFVD4S.js:247 Uncaught TypeError: _b.split is not a function at MysqlUi.getDataTypeForUiType (MysqlUi.ts:990:21) at onUidtOrIdTypeChange (useColumnCreateStore.ts:144:35) at callWithErrorHandling (chunk-I4FFVD4S.js:184:18) at callWithAsyncErrorHandling (chunk-I4FFVD4S.js:192:17) at emit (chunk-I4FFVD4S.js:633:5) at chunk-I4FFVD4S.js:6384:45 at Proxy.triggerChange2 (index.js:119:12) at triggerChange2 (Select.js:370:15) at Proxy.onInternalSelect2 (Select.js:449:7) at onSelectValue2 (OptionList.js:168:15) ``` ### Desired Behavior no error ### Project Details Node: **v18.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** RootDB: **mysql2** PackageVersion: **0.202.4** ### Attachments _No response_
